plugin.name: workarounds
plugin._long: Some hacks that might be required to make things work.

option.name: all_dialogs_modal
option._long: If false, the main window can be focused even if it has a dialog. The dialog is nevertheless kept on top of the main window. Kwin defaults to false.

option.name: dynamic_repaint_delay
option._long: If true, allows Wayfire to dynamically recalculate its max_render_time, i.e allow render time higher than max_render_time.
